title: Sex over 40: Completely Revised and Updated
description: Ten years ago, Saul Rosenthal's Sex Over Forty became the indispensable guidebook to mature sexual health. Now Dr. Saul Rosenthal has crafted a remarkable, fully updated edition of his essential guide.The book deals expertly with a wide range of issues, including: the viagra revolution; how aging affects erectile function; the various treatments of erection problems, and estrogen replacement after menopause.Here is the essential sexual guide for the millions of baby boomers and aging adults who want to maintain their sexual health growing older.
author: Saul M. Rosenthal
